body:
Try adding a multiple of TF.eye, if it's big enough, the inverse exists

On Mar 29, 2017 3:45 PM, "KKKL" <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> @yaroslavvb <https://github.com/yaroslavvb> , I already used
> "tf.matmul(SigmaC, tf.transpose(SigmaC)) + tf.eye(10)", but there is still
> bug that the matrix is inconvertible.
>
